Name: ID
Description: A well-known value 123.  Uniquely identifies this as a SunSpec Immediate Controls Model

Name: L
Description: Length of Immediate Controls Model

Name: Conn_WinTms
Description: Time window for connect/disconnect.

Name: Conn_RvrtTms
Description: Timeout period for connect/disconnect.

Name: Conn
Description: Enumerated valued.  Connection control.

Name: WMaxLimPct
Description: Set power output to specified level.

Name: WMaxLimPct_WinTms
Description: Time window for power limit change.

Name: WMaxLimPct_RvrtTms
Description: Timeout period for power limit.

Name: WMaxLimPct_RmpTms
Description: Ramp time for moving from current setpoint to new setpoint.

Name: WMaxLim_Ena
Description: Enumerated valued.  Throttle enable/disable control.

Name: OutPFSet
Description: Set power factor to specific value - cosine of angle.

Name: OutPFSet_WinTms
Description: Time window for power factor change.

Name: OutPFSet_RvrtTms
Description: Timeout period for power factor.

Name: OutPFSet_RmpTms
Description: Ramp time for moving from current setpoint to new setpoint.

Name: OutPFSet_Ena
Description: Enumerated valued.  Fixed power factor enable/disable control.

Name: VArWMaxPct
Description: Reactive power in percent of I_WMax.

Name: VArMaxPct
Description: Reactive power in percent of I_VArMax.

Name: VArAvalPct
Description: Reactive power in percent of I_VArAval.

Name: VArPct_WinTms
Description: Time window for VAR limit change.

Name: VArPct_RvrtTms
Description: Timeout period for VAR limit.

Name: VArPct_RmpTms
Description: Ramp time for moving from current setpoint to new setpoint.

Name: VArPct_Mod
Description: Enumerated value. VAR limit mode.
Range of values: 2: VAR limit as a % of VArMax

Name: VArPct_Ena
Description: Enumerated valued.  Fixed VAR enable/disable control.

Name: WMaxLimPct_SF
Description: Scale factor for power output percent.

Name: OutPFSet_SF
Description: Scale factor for power factor.

Name: VArPct_SF
Description: Scale factor for reactive power.
